SEARCH
Module org.example.cybooks
Package org.cybooks

Class Loan

java.lang.Object
org.cybooks.Loan
public class Loan extends Object
The Loan class represents a loan of a book by a member.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Loan

      public Loan(int id_loan, String book_isbn, int id_member, Date loan_date, int loan_duration, boolean expired)
      Constructs a new Loan object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      id_loan - the unique identifier of the loan
      book_isbn - the ISBN of the borrowed book
      id_member - the unique identifier of the borrowing member
      loan_date - the date when the loan was initiated
      loan_duration - the duration of the loan in days
      expired - indicates if the loan has expired
